title: godoc.org: Use local jquery, or another CDN.
body:
I it seems like `ajax.googleapis.com` is [blocked in China](http://www.blockedinchina.net/?siteurl=https%3A%2F%2Fajax.googleapis.com%2Fajax%2Flibs%2Fjquery%2F2.0.3%2Fjquery.min.js). 

This makes examples impossible to view. Nothing happens when the "Example" link is clicked.

The solution would be to use an [official](https://code.jquery.com/jquery/) CDN link, which are [available in China](http://www.blockedinchina.net/?siteurl=https%3A%2F%2Fcode.jquery.com%2Fjquery-2.0.3.min.js). Otherwise godoc.org could serve it itself.
